topic.title: Is there any vpn software?
topic.body:
For example, Hamachi . Doesn't use it for break the block but play games with my friends :D
free software first.

7_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY.body: If you are going to mine bitcoin without reason, Then I'll tell you that unless your electricity fee is lower than 0.05$ per kwh, or you are wasting your valuable time and money.

1_1ErQKYWhmtDhQywp72XPrAXJPSEWesCDyd.body: have no idea about what are you talking about

2_1ECmsQzFruxQnUt8DWmC2SKz3xL39XgzSa.body: As a Chinese I have to say that GFW is working with blacklist mode now. And I can visit Zeronet and talk to you now. GOV has blocked google youtube etc. We had to use the Shadowsocks to break the "wall" , however, the developer of it have already give up. It's still works today...

> [akito](#comment_150_1F8omDpXyPsBfd9CBJ91o4Wv1AA2KxqMEY): They already have their own intranet... It's where all the we-chatters and QQ users are.

yup... I'm a telegram user but all of my friends doesn't know it at all.
And it's blocked now.

> [adb](#comment_3_1BXCYRHwwev9cdgoMdWvhgKrMvUp19p2R2): Try this one if shadowsocks* don't work someday :-)

Will give a try soon :D Thanks a lot!

1_18j4Mbw96Fg67wtMXK45mvxMVgu6YuoM95.body: 兄弟别在英文板块下面发帖啊...

1_1E4dgsD9i7VtW5ZEdGX6EbPewT1wrsczqY.body:
> [rewq51](#comment_5_1NyjtgrgdK1b9k2FuMWw4kKFu4PEw6yiyn): Free : SotftetherNon-free : ExpressVPN or NordVPN

This kind of vpn doesn't meed my needs.

> [warren](#comment_2_1w3egfJiP6Hgx6K4dNJjNetVvgC88ZTve): shadowsocks?

need a Lan to Lan bridge... SS doesn't works.
